|brand = BigTree Tech |model = BTT Pi |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1.2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 12/03/2023 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/BigTree_Tech_BTT_Pi |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;H616; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARMv8-A |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz <!-- 1.5 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Kingston;D2516ECMDXGJD; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = 48:8F:4C
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2021.10;BTT-CB1; |stockos = Linux;5.6.17;Debian 11;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot, Micro HDMI |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB (Type-C) Female
|serial = yes,, console,, USB (Type-C) Female,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, Micro HDMI, Audio out (3.5 mm), IR Receiver, SPI, fan header, GPIO |addchip = PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP313A;;1;,,, 5A Wide Input Range Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS5450;;1;,,, USB to Serial Interface;WCH;CH340E;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = biqu |defaultpass = biqu |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 04/2023 |estprice = 40 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0C2KMT8V7 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Trolink TML1512AA |rad1modif = SDIO 3.0 |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8189ES; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "BIGTREETECH" and "Pi V1.2" are on both sides of board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] H616 @1.5GHz :Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) *GPU: ''Mali-G31 MP2'', supports :OpenGL ES 1.0/2.0/3.2, OpenCL 2.0 *Memory: 1GB (DDR3L) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[Realtek]] RTL8189ES :802.11bgn (1T1R) â€¢ [[Trolink]] *Network: 1x FE port *USB: 4x USB 2.0 ports *GPIO: 1x 40-pin headers *Power Source: 5V via USB (Type-C) :or 12-24V via screw terminals
==Links of Interest== *[https://github.com/bigtreetech/BTT-Pi ''BTT-PI'' on '''GitHub'''] *[https://bigtree-tech.com/blogs/news/new-release-bigtreetech-btt-pi ''New Release-BigTreeTech BTT Pi'' on '''Blog'''] *[https://www.tomshardware.com/news/bigtreetech-pi-12-a-raspberry-pi-alternative-aimed-squarely-at-3d-printers ''BigTreeTech Pi 1.2 Is a Raspberry Pi Alternative'' on '''Tom's HardWare''']
==See also== *[[BigTree Tech BTT Pi]] *[[BigTree Tech CB1]] *[[BigTree Tech CB1 eMMC]]
